response.overview: As part of the National Lottery Heritage Fund project Disrupt the Archive, Northumberland Archives collaborated with young people from Wooler Drop-In and 1st Wooler BP Scouts to create a film inspired by local history and archival collections. Through their own perspectives, the young filmmakers explore life in Wooler, reflecting on their experiences and uncovering the history of Glendale Middle School â€“ once the site of a Prisoner of War camp.
response.title: The Wooler Way of Life
